METHOD GetEventAlarmID : BOOL
This method gets information about an Event-Alarm of a certain module.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
GetEventAlarmID
BOOL
The return value indicates whether an Event-Alarm could be
found.
Input
inst
AC.IModule
The module instance the Event-Alarm belongs to.
pEventTargetID
POINTER TO STRING
The target of the Event-Alarm
Output
alarmGroupID
AlarmManager.ALARMGROUP_ID
The alarm-groupId of the found Event-Alarm
alarmID
AlarmManager.ALARM_ID
The alarmId of the found Event-Alarm
